Documentation

Documenting the data that you release is arguably as important as releasing it in the first place.

Document the data

Metadata, where it was sourced from, what is is inclusive up, what it is missing (sampled records? sampled fields?)

Document the format

This is way easier if you’re using a standard

Document the delivery mechanism

If it’s a flat file mechanism, explain that in detail with step by step instructions. Inspiration file download documentation: * bank statements

API

If it’s an API document the API as well as possible. Inspirational api documentation:

  • twitter
  • foursquare
